short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button for tournament homepage in Tabroom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quality of life fixes for Tabroom.com, the debate website. Features include:
-Removal of tew tab links for a more compact experience
-Tournament home button on results and current page
-Quick links to easily Google judges
-Button to reveal competitor names from their codes on the pairings page (next to the print button, top right!)
-Easy keyboard shortcut to open Tabroom (alt-T)
